Package com.dua3.meja.model

Interface CellStyle

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericCellStyle, PoiCellStyle
public interface CellStyle
Definition of a cell style.

  • Method Details

    • copyStyle

      default void copyStyle(CellStyle other)
      Copy style from another cell style.
      Parameters:
      other - cell style

    • getBorderStyle

      BorderStyle getBorderStyle(Direction d)
      Get border style.
      Parameters:
      d - specifies the edge the border style applies to
      Returns:
      the border style for the edge matching direction d used in this cell style

    • getDataFormat

      String getDataFormat()
      Get data format.
      Returns:
      the data format used in this cell style

      Returns:
      the background fill color used in this cell style

      Get font.
      Returns:

    • getHAlign

      HAlign getHAlign()
      Get horizontal alignment.
      Returns:
      the horizontal alignment used in this cell style

    • effectiveHAlign

      default HAlign effectiveHAlign(CellType cellType)
      Get the effective HAlign for the given cell type.

      For HAlign.ALIGN_AUTOMATIC, the default alignment for the cell type is returned. Other values are returned unchanged.

      Parameters:
      cellType - the cell type
      Returns:
      the default effective alignment

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the name of the cell style.
      Returns:
      the name of this cell style

    • getVAlign

      VAlign getVAlign()
      Get vertical alignment.
      Returns:
      the vertical alignment used in this cell style

    • getWorkbook

      Workbook getWorkbook()
      Get workbook this cell style belongs to.
      Returns:
      the workbook

    • isWrap

      boolean isWrap()
      Get text wrapping.
      Returns:
      true if text should be wrapped

    • isStyleWrapping

      default boolean isStyleWrapping()
      Determine whether text should be wrapped. This takes into account the value of isWrap(), getHAlign() and getVAlign().
      Returns:
      true, if the text should be wrapped when displayed

    • setBorderStyle

      void setBorderStyle(Direction d, BorderStyle borderStyle)
      Set border style
      Parameters:
      d - specifies the edge the border style is to be applied to
